messages.message:
Hi team,
As part of replacing our uat.dogfood GCP env with a sandbox in AWS (https://release-24-07.internal.instabase.com/), we are setting up system tests on the new environment which will be triggered at the end of every deployment like we did on uat.dogfood.
I have configured the S3 flow-review, file-system, file-service-api, ml-infra, ml-studio test suites on it but we need to setup a bunch more. Test owners, can you please help?
1. database-api: @Jeff 
2. S3-encrypted: @Cheryl Zhou ?
3. NFS, AZ Blob Store: @Pridhvi Vegesna 
4. :white_check_mark:GCS: @Cheryl Zhou 
5. ~HCP: @Heymian do we need this?~
6. :white_check_mark:~ADFS~, saml: @Xindi Xu
7. ~doc-search: @Pridhvi Vegesna~
8. S3-server-side-encryption: @Pridhvi Vegesna
9. Flow-scheduler: @Abhishek Adupa 
Sandbox: https://release-24-07.internal.instabase.com/ (admin credentials are in 1Pass)
The test config can be found here (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/release-24.07.0-enterprise/tools/releasetools/jenkins/system_test_config.json#L544-L560)
We do not need HCP. We don't support that in our envs, or any other env except Bofa.
We also do not need ADFS, that is only relevant to JPMC
Doc-search is not needed, that's a feature that never left experimental stages.
Awesome. Thank you. Updated the list
